description: Table for attachments associated with referrals.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DOC_ID
columns.description: Stores a list of attachments associated with the referral.

columns.name: DOC_ATTACH_USER_ID
columns.description: Indicates the user who attached the document to the referral.

columns.name: DOC_ATTACH_DTTM
columns.description: Indicates the instant, in UTC, when the document was attached to the referral.
